M10=0005
M11=0010
I10=0010
I0=0000
M3=0001
R1=0002
R2=0003
R3=0001
CALL(M10,I10)
CALL(M10,I10)
CALL(M11,I10)
IDLE
NOP
FINISH

.CALL(0015)
R1=R1+R2
RTS

.CALL(0020)
R1=R1-R3
DM(I0,M3)=R1
IF NE JUMP(M11,I10)
RTS

.MEMCHECK
0000 0007
0001 0006
0002 0005
0003 0004
0004 0003
0005 0002
0006 0001
0007 0000
